SEARCH
Package AppointmentSystem

Class AppointmentController

Object
AppointmentController
public class AppointmentController extends Object
The AppointmentController class is responsible for managing appointment records, providing functionalities for administrators, doctors, and patients. It supports viewing, scheduling, rescheduling, canceling, and updating appointments.
